channel.title: The Funniest/Most Retard Pic of You
channel.description:
Well, to avoid utter humiliation later on, I decided to make this topic.
I was on MSN with Matthew [b]playing Pokemon Yellow [/b](Oh ya, I'm cool.) and showed him. I then turned the camera on me and as it was moving, he took a picture while I was laughing.
Here it is. [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/7726/hahahablackmail.jpg[/img]
Oh and, I don't really look like that. Give me a while (Like until tomorrow) and I'll post a pic of me, unless i can get my webcam to. The reason I look like this is because it was dark in my room, I was laughing, and moving.
Credits to M.Dog311 for taking :D
So, post pics of you looking bad, funny, or anything you wouldn't normally post.
~Lin

item.title: The Funniest/Most Retard Pic of You
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:41, topic:284095”][quote author=AeroScape link=topic=375476.msg2834708#msg2834708 date=1245550514]

you look like internet nerds. lmao

Yeah typically people on runescape private server websites are nerds, sorry to dissapoint you.

I haven’t seen your pic?

Found him.

[/quote]I call that TooMuchRunescape-Influenza.

But really, that must be edited or something.
I would hang myself if I was was that kid.
Shit, now I feel really bad.

he cant hang himself, the noose would have to be thiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiis big.[/quote]
No no! You got it all wrong there! It would have to be thiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiis big plus change for his cheeks.

Read full topic

I would hang myself if I was was that kid.

  1. No edit
  2. He’s in his 30s
  3. He has most of it removed

Man, everyone here must be illiterate. This has been in the news, hell, TV. Retards.

item.title: The Funniest/Most Retard Pic of You
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:38, topic:284095”][quote author=Lin link=topic=375476.msg2831168#msg2831168 date=1245368723]
This is obviously really off-topic, that pic doesn’t seem real. It’s probably fake (LIKE HOW SOMEONE MADE IT LOOK LIKE BOXXY SHOWED HER BOOBS. Don’t ask how I know that.).

Just doesn’t seem real. Maybe it is, but oh well.
[/quote]

I watched the documentary about the elephant man on “Extraordinary People” and iirc he did manage to remove some of the tumour in the end.

How do you know how boxxy’s “real” tits look like because all of the examples on /b/ are obviously photoshop’d. I would presume she has real nice tits irl , I wish I actually went onto 4chan when she was really famous.[/quote]
Someone send me the link to that pic please…

item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“AMERIKA, post:32, topic:284095”][quote author=Lin link=topic=375476.msg2831168#msg2831168 date=1245368723]
This is obviously really off-topic, that pic doesn’t seem real. It’s probably fake (LIKE HOW SOMEONE MADE IT LOOK LIKE BOXXY SHOWED HER BOOBS. Don’t ask how I know that.).

Just doesn’t seem real. Maybe it is, but oh well.
[/quote]
This specific picture could be a fake, but there are people out there like this. Its called Elephant Man Syndrome or something like that. Just google ‘Elephant man’ (its not the rapper rofl).[/quote]

I remember when i was a kid i saw that on national geographic, and it said you would get it by eating fish food with these ‘worms’ in them and that your legs would virbrate, and when i was in bed i was so scared my legs would vibrate and i’d totaly freak out.

lul

Yeah typically people on runescape private server websites are nerds, sorry to dissapoint you.

In a way I agree. But then again, it goes to the debate the government is having about abortions and stuff. Killing him would be good in some people’s eyes, but horrible in others. I honestly agree with taking him out of his misery, et cetera. But to other people, they think that a person like him have a chance to live a fulfilled life :\
